text: Agek bɨawl ak agɨnɨgab, Nad bɨ wog gɨñeb tɨmel yɨbɨl ak agɨnɨgab agak. Takaw nak apan ak, ne ke tɨg adɨkɨl nɨgɨnɨgayn agɨnɨgab agak. Yɨp apan, Bɨ kabɨyam tɨmel yɨbɨl, binɨb tap kɨlop okok sɨkim gɨtep gɨl mel, pɨl gɨl tek dɨpan, tap wog koslam gɨl yɨbal okok nad kɨles gɨl nep taw pɨlɨg ñɨban apan agɨnɨgab agak.
